subject: httpunit and session objects
msgSnippet: I am trying to use httpunit to test my web app.  Is there a way to add an object to the session in httpunit?  The reason I ask is that I am using a filter to
messageBody:
I am trying to use httpunit to test my web app. Is there a way to add
an object to the "session" in httpunit? The reason I ask is that I am
using a filter to verify certain things in the session before the user
can actually get into some of the jsp pages.
